name: Nagmap
body:
Intro
=====

NagMap project is an initiative to create super-simple application to integrate Nagios or Icinga with Google maps. The integration aims to visualize current status of network devices on aerial photography
images. 

The single point of contact for this project is here: http://exchange.nagios.org/directory/Addons/Maps-and-Diagrams/nagmap/details - please use this site for contacts and more information.
tagline: NagMap - standalone integration of Nagios or Icinga into Google Maps
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
